name: Eco-friendly Bomb Golf
description:
Welcome to Eco-friendly Bomb Golf.

Click, drag and launch bombs and plastic bottles, pinball style.

Space bar to explode bombs. 

You can catch bottles again in mid-air to redirect.

Dark brown platforms are destructible.

Recycle that bottle.

Credits: 

Programming and game design - Mike Bailey

Sprites - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/free-platformer-tileset-1825...

Bottle - https://pixabay.com/vectors/bottle-plastic-mortgage-1708751/

Bin - https://images.app.goo.gl/fSpqjWGLiqoNUSaCA
